name: Police Chase Hill Car 3D: Cops Auto Racing Driver
name_original: Police Chase Hill Car 3D: Cops Auto Racing Driver
description:
Get yourself in police department street crime branch. Cops are deciding to shut down illegal street activity carried out in city hill area. Your role is to be a part of these illegal street racers and cooperate with city police and arrest them. Takedown street racers during race by blocking their way. Some of these racers got professional skills, to take them you need to sharpen your race track driving skills.


Compete in different racing formats. Beat time in to eliminate rival racers in lap knock-out challenge. Speed trap will test your extremely fast driving ability to attain top speed. Drift in corners of track to retain leader position in wonderful circuit track. Accelerate your modified police car in chase mode to pullover and arrest escaping racers.


Features:
9 amazing modified police cars.
Time elimination race.
Speed trap challenge.
Chase mode.
Lap knock-out challenge.
Block road to arrest rivals.


Download Police Chase Hill Car 3D: Cops Auto Racing Driver to become extreme police car racer. Provide us with your valuable feedback so can improve and provide you with better games.
